mapper.update: update customer_addresses set city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moblephone = #{moblephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, city_id, receiver, address, moblephone, zip_code, is_default, customer_id, status, created_at, updated_at, telphone from customer_addresses where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, city_id, receiver, address, moblephone, zip_code, is_default, customer_id, status, created_at, updated_at, telphone from customer_addresses
